name: Lily (Bzitout)
description:
2 players Coop gameplay. Game made for a student gamejam in 2017.

Credit:

  • Theo Besson
  • Bastien Mahaut 
  • Louis Florance
  • Florent Galvin 

Lily is lost in her nightmare, you need to find a way out !

The Light monster need to bite Lily to keep his light. But being bitten does damages and So Lily need to rest after a bite. If the light goes off, its game over, same if Lily takes too mush damages.

Use the light to find a way out. But be carefull not to bite too much.

The game is in French, made in France using Unity.
